attributes.action: Lie detector tests for benefit entitlement and support back for the real UK

attributes.background:
Are you dying? If you are you're not alone, we all are but some people have being dying all their life and others die. 

Save the ones who the lesson was inflicted upon until learnt and bring our warriors back alive.
